The source of the claim was identified a: New Hampshire News Network" which is known for posting fictional content about the state.
The amusement park: Story Land, released a statement debunking the rumor and assuring the public that they have no plans of closing their doors.
Snopes Media Group: a renowned fact-checking organization, verified the claim and provided their expert verdict that the closure announcement was false.
The disclaimer on the: New Hampshire News Network" Facebook page clearly stated that it is a satirical news source, indicating that the claim should not be taken seriously.
